General.Name: Farlim Group (Malaysia) Bhd
General.Description: Farlim Group (Malaysia) Bhd., an investment holding company, develops properties in Malaysia. The company operates through Property and Trading segments. It develops and sells residential and commercial properties; and trades in building materials. The company was formerly known as Perumahan Farlim (Malaysia) Sdn. Bhd. and changed its name to Farlim Group (Malaysia) Bhd. in October 1994. The company was incorporated in 1982 and is based in Ayer Itam, Malaysia. Farlim Group (Malaysia) Bhd. is a subsidiary of Farlim Holding Sdn. Bhd.
